text: Abdillahi Diiriye Guled, also known as Arale/Caraale (), is a Somali literature expert and prosodist. He is known as the person who found the Somali Scansion system. == Works == * Miisaanka Maansada (1975) * Gabaygeena Miisaan (1978) * Jiiftadeena Miisaan (1978) * Gibil Xidh: Miisaanka Maansada Soomaaliyeed (2016) Category:Somali people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Abdillahi Diiriye Guled
